divs: Sighting Detailswe were headed east on iterstate 8 about 2 miles west of a rest area west ofelcentro ca. the object appeared approximately 400 yards ahead and to the northside of the freeway,at first it looked like a large plastic bag floating abovethe road but it was not moving in any direction, my girl freind said it lookedlike a news paper. as we got closer it began to move away from the highway norththen suddenly the color changed from a white and grey to solid black,and theshape changed to a prefect triangle,but i could make out what looked like roundpaterns like balls that made the triangle, like pool balls in a rack. the objectbegan to move north at a very fast speed,i could still see the triangle shapemove away like a zoom lens, then when it was about a quarter of mile away i sawit turn on its side so that the silhoutte looked almost flat then it began toaccelerate at a very high rate of speed going north north east,then went out ofsight.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 18th 2003
